resources.string: This game tests your memory power by asking you to recollect the locations of the images.

You will be shown a set of images. You have 15 seconds to remember the location of each images. After the timeout, the images are flipped and you will be presented a random image. You will have to identify where that image is located in the set and click on the location. If it is a match, the image will be revealed.
The objective of the game is to identify all the images.
Well done!! You have taken %d tries to identify all the images correctly.\n\nYou can now Replay or Exit the game.
This game requires internet connectivity to download the images.\nPlease check your connection and try again.
